mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SETS WHERE (DS_CODE=#{keyword} or DS_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND DATA_SET_TYPE = 0 AND STUDY_TYPE = #{study} LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SETS WHERE (DS_CODE=#{keyword} or DS_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND DATA_SET_TYPE = 0 AND STUDY_TYPE = #{study}
